Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:45:55
Folder: C12X6BN - new smoking area - ho1
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C12X6BN_00
From: Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-11 12:35
Subject: New Smoking Area - HO1
--------------------------------------------------
Hello everyone,
 
I hope my email finds you well.
 
Effective this week, we have relocated our smoking area to a new designated spot at Head Office 1. The previous area is now considered a non-smoking zone.
 
Where is the new designated smoking area?
It is located on the the left side of the main entrance. Please refer to the attached photos for a better understanding of the new location.
 
To maintain a comfortable work environment for all our colleagues, we appreciate your cooperation in ensuring that smoking is limited to the designated area.
 
Thank you for your understanding.
 
Regards,
 

RAMI RIMAN​​​​	
SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION	
REAL EMIRATES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 563 2000
